text: Has anyone used the imports crm api? I am trying to make a post to*`/crm/v3/imports/`* for objects associations.
it turned out to be my fault, we were being rate limited and failing instead of waiting and retrying.

yeah, pretty terrible..

having pipeline_id’s and standardized options for stages would be pretty useful..

API questions:
1. Is there some way to programmatically get a list of a single Contact’s “*Custom* Behavioural Events” (Beta “CBEs”,  *not* Legacy “BEs”)
2. Anyone have any insight as to when CBEs will be added as a method to trigger Workflows (currently only BEs)?
3. Is there an endpoint that will get us all the “page-views” (and related event data) for a given Contact? This appears to be a very asked for but ignored feature request. ( <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Get-Contact-Web-Activity-via-API/m-p/230546|p2>, <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Web-Activity-API/idc-p/379408/highlight/true#M66739|p3>, <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Web-Activity-API/idc-p/379408#M66739|i1>)
